ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: that He is responsible for the second existence;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That the second creation is incumbent on Him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and that it is for Him to grant the second life,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and on Him depends the life hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And that only upon Him is the next revival?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that upon Him is another bringing forth (Resurrection).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that on Him is the bringing forth a second time;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and that upon Him rests the second growth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And that He hath ordained the second bringing forth;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and that He will bring about the Second Creation;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And that upon Him is another bringing forth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: that with Him lies the second genesis,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That He hath promised a Second Creation (Raising of the Dead);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that upon Him (Allah) is another bringing forth (Resurrection);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and that upon Him is the second creation
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And that upon Him is the next existence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:47] and that with Him rests the second genesis (read al-nashā’ata, or al-nash’ata), the other creation, for the Resurrection, after the first creation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And that He hath ordained the second bringing forth) the other creation after the resurrection;
